profile: With professional, dedicated plumbing service to all major cities and surrounding areas in Alberta, and with some of the best plumbers in the industry, The Gentlemen Plumbers work hard to exceed your expectations and deliver quality. If you need a plumber, call us today for plumbing or heating issues, leaky sinks and faucets, clogged drains, toilet, bathtub and shower repairs, furnace cleaning and repairs, hot water tanks and tankless hot water heaters, furnace installation and maintenance, trenchless pipe repair, camera sewer inspection, and more! We have local branches in Calgary, Edmonton, Red Deer, Lethbridge, and Medicine Hat, with extended service all over Southern Alberta, including Camrose, Sherwood Park, St. Albert, Airdrie, High River, Crossfield, Carstairs, Olds, Innisfail, Wetaskiwin, Leduc, Lacombe, Okotoks, Nanton, Taber, Cardston, Didsbury, Brooks, Crowsnest Pass, Cochrane, Strathmore, Sundre, Three Hills, Ponoka, Fort Macleod, Pincher Creek, Bowden, Fort Saskatchewan, Chestermere, Sylvan Lake, Spruce Grove, and Stony Plain.

profile:
We are the Furnace Family, Edmonton & Calary's 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed Lennox Premier Dealer. If your furnace or air conditioner needs to be repaired or replaced, we are available 24/7. The Furnace Family believes in traditional values, honest pricing and doing the job right the first time. 

The Furnace Family is a family owned HVAC company specializing in residential furnace replacement and service, air conditioning, indoor air quality and water heaters.

Why choose the Furnace Family?
 
-100% satisfaction guarantee
We do the job right the first time, our combined years’ experience results in the best installation possible.
 
-Family owned an operated.
Just as the name says, we are a family. We are proud of our work and our workforce they are like our family. We all work together to keep customers happy. 
 
-Superior customer service.
With our accreditation and A_ rating from the better business bureau as well as being a Premier Lennox dealer you know you can trust that your HVAC system is in good hands.
 
-For a greener tomorrow
We understand the importance of conservation and efficiency.  We recycle all cardboard, refrigerant, and metals.  You can be sure we are doing our part for the environment.
 
Maybe you don't want to shop every heating company in town and you don't have too. Let our family be the one you call to keep yours comfortable.

Please visit us at furnacefamily.com or call us at 780-4FAMILY.

***Furnace Family is now Offers AIR MILES® Reward Miles***

profile:
Mr Rooter Plumbing Edmonton strives to be the best plumbing company Edmonton has to offer! Our technicians are also drain repair specialists in the main drain, floor drain, & sewer drain services. Mr. Rooter Plumbing Edmonton provides 24/7 emergency Edmonton plumbing & drain cleaning service. Your plumbing and drain repairs are done right, the first time! Our local Edmonton plumbers will arrive on time, consult with you before starting anything, work rapidly and efficiently on the exact issues discussed while respecting you and your Edmonton home. For prompt quality workmanship and professional plumbers call Mr. Rooter Plumbing Edmonton at 780-429-3600 today!

Providing Fast Repairs & Maintenance in Sherwood Park & Beyond
 
Want a plumbing company that provides outstanding customer service paired with skilled results? Look no further than Mr. Rooter® Plumbing of Edmonton! We proudly serve residential and commercial customers throughout Sherwood Park and the surrounding areas, tackling everything from pipe leaks to new fixture installation. We are your top choice for professional plumbing services in Edmonton, so do not hesitate to call us around-the-clock for trusted service.
 
We deliver professional and knowledgeable service here at Mr. Rooter Plumbing. 
Reach out to (780) 429-3600 for an appointment.

profile:
Urban Piping Ltd is a unique family first plumbing company established in 2008.  We've come along way since then but we still offer the same wholesome service that made us great.  We always have a real journeyman plumber who will answer your calls and help you with anything plumbing related and make sure that the right technician is dispatched for your precise job.  

Our team is trained in every aspect of the plumbing, whether it be a simple hot water tank replacement, to a complicated Poly Butyene replacement, our team has you covered. We also carry a large variety of drain cleaning equipment, so no need to look any further to find someone to tackle that pesky clog. 

What makes Urban Piping Ltd unique is the way our company operates, we put our staff first. You'll be hard pressed to find a happier team than the men and women that make up our great company.  

So see for yourself and experience the Urban Piping Ltd difference.

profile:
Hydro-Flo Plumbing and Heating Ltd offers HVAC, plumbing and sewer service and installations in Edmonton Alberta and surrounding areas. The includes Leduc, Beaumont, Saint Albert, Spruce Grove, Stoney Plain, Nisku, Millet, Sherwood Park, Sturgeon County, and Fort Saskatchewan.

We operate 24 hours a day for all air conditioning, heating, sewer and plumbing emergencies.

In addition, we offer new installation of major HVAC Equipment like hot water heaters, boilers, rooftop units, furnaces, and plumbing systems.  

We also offer 24 hour drain cleaning, sewer steaming  and video line inspection.

All estimates are free and services are guaranteed. 

Financing Options are available for major equipment.

We are licensed, bonded and insured and can tackle any project from a simple service to large new construction or retrofit project.

profile:
At Reliance The Furnace Company, the safety and well-being of both our Customers and our Team Members is always our top priority. We are actively monitoring the Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation and are taking precautionary measures to aid in keeping our communities safe. We have implemented strict safety protocols to provide both our Customers and Team members with peace of mind during this challenging time. We continue to provide the exceptional customer experiences we are so well known for and want you to know that we are here for you when you need us.

To help with prevention, we are taking the following precautionary measures to protect our Customers.

Our Team Members have been equipped with an ample supply of:

* Hand sanitizers
* Disinfectant wipes
* Masks
* Single-use gloves
* Boot covers

We know that this is a difficult time for all and we want you to know that we will be there for you and are taking all the necessary precautions to keep you and your family comfortable and safe.



Reliance™ - The Furnace Company has been delivering high quality home comfort products and services to the Edmonton market for over 10 years. We were the first Lennox Premier Dealer in Edmonton and are the only Capital Region based dealer to have won the prestigious Dave Lennox Award, as one of the Top 25 Dealers in North America out of over 6500 dealers.  Now part of the Reliance™ national network, we bring over 40 years of experience with a full service of heating and cooling solutions, ranging from sales and service, financing to rental options. This means you can trust that Reliance™ - The Furnace Company will be here for the long haul and continue to offer you the same exceptional service our customers have come to expect.
When you choose Reliance™- The Furnace Company, you’re choosing one of the largest HVAC providers in Canada, with over 1.2 million customers and growing. You can expect your call to be answered 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year and one of the largest networks of licensed technicians in Canada.
After all, we believe you are buying much more than home comfort equipment, you’re buying a relationship. As you can see, it really is all about you! Your satisfaction is our top priority.

Some services that we offer are, Furnaces, Air-Conditioners and Water Heaters

Our Mission:
We provide our customers peace of mind. We take the risk out of products and services that are essential to their lives and businesses. We make it easy.
888-837-1451 is a TOLL FREE No., please feel free to contact!!

profile:
Hello. I have 22 years of plumbing experience

I provide the following services: any plumbing related to kitchen and bathroom(toilet and shower ,sink, faucets), water heater repair and install, dishwashers, garburator, drainage services and repair including snaking and camera drain including abs pipe repair and replace , outside faucets replacement, waterline repair and install including cooper and pex.

Areas I cover are Edmonton and surrounding areas.

Please give me a call at 780-975-4968. I look forward to hearing from you!
